node.name: 30-Inch Medium Metal Cage MAKE: SMARTY PET
node.description: High quality durable powder coating on iron, foldable mechanism and removable plastic tray at bottom for easy cleaning. 2.5 Feet high creates a space for foreign breeds as well like Bulldog or Great Dane. Joints are skill welded so that even strongest attempt of dog comes to failure. (SIZE: 962x762x622mm / WEIGHT: 8.5 Kg /  MATERIAL: Iron & Plastic)
node.content:
1. 'Den' of his own that provide comfort to pet and safe enough from predators in case of small animals like rabbits. 
2. Most of the new pet die at their early age due to insecurity and as soon as a person brings a new pet at home it needs to have a place of his own to relax and feel secure 
3. Cover from all side that can fit full-size foreign breed dogs or more than 5 rabbits 
4. Metal bars are powder coated against any corrosion and joints are highly durable that can handle the strongest push 
5. Self-lock latch cannot be removed by any predator and need special turn which can be done by human only 
6. Spaces between bars are small so that no predator can grasp rabbits from outside 
7. Weight is equally distributed so that the cage cannot be overturned.
node.alt: Smarty Pet Paws For A Cause Metal Cage With Removable Tray For DogsRabbit Blue 30 Inch Medium

node.name: 36-Inch Large Metal Cage MAKE: JAINSONS PET PRODUCTS
node.description: Durable heavy duty metal dog cage with single door design for front entry and exit. Scratch proof washable pan at the bottom for grown up dog and cat. 3 feet in length is optimum size for foreign breed dogs. Mat is provided along with Cage for the case buyer use to pet rabbit or duck. (SIZE: 972x590x635mm / WEIGHT: 15 Kg / MATERIAL: Iron)
node.content:
1. Ideal for both puppies and adult dogs which required no tools for setting up.
2. Cages are used to train the dog and Cat so that they can adjust inside the indoor. 
3. 3 feet is the highest length which is provided for the cage and it creates a standard space for 2 adult dogs. 
4. Using quality raw material, powder-coated iron bars, and a 4-inch latch, this Cage is subjected to on load test.
5. Suitable for all toy breeds like Chihuahua, beagle, minpin, and Indian Spitz. 
6. Iron bars are welded perfectly but in case of damage product replaceable guarantee is also provided.
node.alt: JAINSONS PET PRODUCTS 36inch Metal Dog Cage Blue Large

node.name: 24-Inch Small Iron Cage MAKE: ROYAL PET
node.description: Replaceable plastic base, non-corrosive steel bars and enough space for 2 Indian dogs. Joints are not rigid and hinged so that can be folded at time of no use. Space between bars is small enough so that cats and rabbits can't escape. Latch to close the door and without any pointed part so that pet get hurt inside. (SIZE: 931x622x598mm / WEIGHT: 6 Kg / MATERIAL: Steel)
node.content:
1. Well said that managing pets is difficult than human baby & therefore this shelter is made with all desirable requirements to act as a home for pet.    
2. Optional divider and 2 feet high shelter can fit 2 Indian dogs which are smaller in size as compared to foreign breeds
3. Removable plastic pan is provided for small pets like rabbits so that their waste disposal can be managed easily 
4. Sharp edges are prohibited so that pet can move inside freely and even rub its body using steel bars
5. Corrosion-free steel bars so that shelter can be placed in the open air, also create no issue if put under the rain for cleaning
6. Space between bars is small enough and do not let rabbits or cats escape or predators to go inside
7. Recommended for a single dog or 4 cats or rabbits and most purchased item by new pet shop owners.
node.alt: Royal Pet 24inch Iron and Plastic Cage with Removable Tray for Dogs and Rabbits Blue

node.name: 30-Inch Medium Metal Cage MAKE: W9
node.description: Assemble housing solution for cat & dog, no nut-bolt system making assembly easier than ever. Pets required the good ventilation and air flow which are basic consideration behind the designing of this Cage. Durable powder coating on iron against any corrosion. (SIZE: 890x712x485mm / WEIGHT: 9.5 Kg / MATERIAL: Iron)
node.content:
1. Small cages can be used by Municipality workers for catching street dogs.   
2. This cage can be assembled without using any tools, just slide the pieces together, and all good to go.
3. Powder-coated metal body, base plastic tray and carry handle is provided so that Cage can be lifted without holding any edges which generally un-shape the metal bars. 
4. Recommended that never cover the cage with cloth because animals required good ventilation. 
5. Spaces between bars are small enough that one can pet 2 ducks as well.
6. Weight is below 10 Kg which makes it easy for transporting and carrying by a mid teenager. 
7. Purchased by street dog control departments and remote area pet lovers for ducks and rabbits.
